result.name: planning-casework-service
result.notes: Holds records relating to the Inspectorate's processing of planning\enforcement\listed building\conservation area consent\lawful development certificate\advertisement appeals where the decision is taken by an appointed Inspector, plus Secretary of State casework (i.e. called in and recovered planning applications where the decision is taken by the Secretary of State.)

organization.name: planning-inspectorate
organization.title: Planning Inspectorate
organization.description:
The Planning Inspectorate deals with planning appeals, national infrastructure planning applications, examinations of local plans and other planning-related and specialist casework in England and Wales.
the Planning Inspectorate is an executive agency of the Department for Communities and Local Government

result.title: Planning casework service

extras.value: Some data already made available on Planning Portal
